'''Tribal Secret Spaces''', also called '''troves''', are an exploration mechanic in [[Natlan]] that requires [[Obsidian Ring]]s to open.

Accessing these spaces requires a minimum [[Adventure Rank]] of 45 or higher in order to create the Obsidian Ring. These rings are crafted by finding [[Obsidian Fragment]]s, which are randomly found while opening Precious and Luxurious [[Chest]]s in [[Natlan]] in the tribe's corresponding region.
